com.vungle.sdk

Interface VunglePub.EventListener

  • Enclosing class:
    VunglePub
    Deprecated. 
    Please use EventListener with VunglePub.addEventListeners(com.vungle.publisher.EventListener...) instead.

    public static interface VunglePub.EventListener

    The interface to implement in order to be notified of ad lifecycle events.

    Note that the callbacks are executed on a different thread than your main UI thread, so if you interact with your UI in the callback, you will need to use a technique to execute your callback on the main UI thread. Two common ways to run your code on the UI thread include the following:

    • Handler
    • Activity.runOnUiThread(Runnable)
    See Also:
    VunglePub.setEventListener(EventListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onVungleAdEnd()
      Deprecated. 
      Called when the user exits the ad (video and postroll, if any).
      void onVungleAdStart()
      Deprecated. 
      Called when the user enters the video ad.
      void onVungleView(double watchedSeconds, double videoSeconds)
      Deprecated. 
      Called when the user exits the ad with information about the user's longest video view (if the user watched the video multiple times).

    • Method Detail

      • onVungleAdEnd

        Deprecated.

      • onVungleAdStart

        void onVungleAdStart()
        Deprecated. 
        Called when the user enters the video ad.

      • onVungleView

        void onVungleView(double watchedSeconds,
                double videoSeconds)
        Deprecated. 
        Called when the user exits the ad with information about the user's longest video view (if the user watched the video multiple times).
        Parameters:
        watchedSeconds - the longest the user watched the video (in seconds).
        videoSeconds - the length of the video (in seconds).
